changeSet.author: glasir
changeSet.sql:
-- @version $Id: //hosting-blueprint/B2CBlueprint/version/10.1.1/EStore/sql/ddlgen/store_ddl.xml#1 $$Change: 690623 $
create table crs_store_location ( store_id varchar2(40) not null, site_id varchar2(40) not null, store_name varchar2(250) not null, address_1 varchar2(256) null, address_2 varchar2(256) null, address_3 varchar2(256) null, city varchar2(40) null, county varchar2(40) null, state varchar2(40) null, postal_code varchar2(10) null, country varchar2(40) null, phone_number varchar2(40) null, fax_number varchar2(40) null, email varchar2(255) null ,constraint crs_store_locatn_p primary key (store_id));
